name: Froggy Wars VR
description:
You're the world's last hope of survival.. with your magic infused guns you are the only one who can stop the frogs invasion..

There are two types of magical frogs, Red and Blue. your Blue gun can kill Red frogs, while the Red gun can kill Blue frogs. if you hit a frog with the same colored gun it will only grow bigger and become harder to kill.

As long as you don't hit the wrong frog or let frogs pass, your combo will increase up to 4X which will be multiplied by the score you get from each kill.

Assets:

Mine:

- VR Interactions - Made by me pre-jam

- Code - All by me

Ready-Made:

- Frogs - Unity Asset Store

- Tunnels - Unity Asset Store

- Guns - Unity Asset Store

- Hands - Unity Asset Store

- CartoonFX - Unity Asset Store

- Background Musix  - Unity Asset Store

- SoundsFX - Freesound

Enjoy!
